          <title>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">La première loi de Kirchhoff</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates the law of conservation of current at circuit junctions.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre la loi de l'économie
du courant aux jonctions de circuit.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra a lei do conservation 
da corrente em junções do circuito.</string>
          </description>
